Package alpha.characters

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
alpha.characters.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public class Entity extends Object
The Entity class is what handles all living creatures stats. This includes Enemies and Players. The main stats everyone has is Health, Damage, and defence. There are tweaks need to be made but this is it for now.

    Entity(String name)
    For simpilar characters like minions and nps, I wanted to give a simple default constructor, you do need to add a name though.
    Entity(String name, int health, int damage, int defence, int numberOfAbilities)
    Gives child classes the ability to be as detailed as possible when giving all the important stats needed in a turn-based rpg

  • Constructor Details

    • Entity

      public Entity(String name)
      For simpilar characters like minions and nps, I wanted to give a simple default constructor, you do need to add a name though.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the entity

    • Entity

      public Entity(String name, int health, int damage, int defence, int numberOfAbilities)
      Gives child classes the ability to be as detailed as possible when giving all the important stats needed in a turn-based rpg
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the entity
      health - Health of the entity
      damage - Damage of the entity
      defence - Defence of the entity
      numberOfAbilities - The number of abilities an entity will have

  • Method Details

    • attack

      public int attack()
      Returns the current enetities damage as long as they are alive, if not it will simply return 0
      Returns:
      The entities damage

    • getNumberOfAbilities

      public int getNumberOfAbilities()
      Returns:
      The number of abilites an entity has

    • hurt

      public void hurt(int damage)
      Handles how Entities take damage, while a more advance defence stat will be made, for not it blocks a flat amount. So if you have more defence than someone's damage, they will always do 0 damage. This means as of now people need to either do alot of damage, or defence needs to be very low.
      Parameters:
      damage - The damage the entity is about to take.

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Returns:
      The bool determining if the entity is alive

    • levelUp

      protected void levelUp(int level)
      Increases level a certain number of times
      Parameters:
      level - Number of levels the entity is increasing

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Used for when a band fails and need to restart a level.

    • setAbilities

      public void setAbilities(Ability[] abilities)
      New set of abilities to a new one with a new array of abilities, but it wont work if the size is not the same as numberOfAbilities
      Parameters:
      abilities - New set of abilities

    • setAlive

      private void setAlive(boolean isAlive)
      Parameters:
      isAlive - The new bool determining if the entity is alive

    • setMaxHealth

      public void setMaxHealth(int maxHealth)
      Parameters:
      maxHealth - New maxhealth of an entity

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Parameters:
      name - The new name of an entity
